subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: Mike Baxter’s opening day debut with the Mets will be his first with a major league team in his eight-year career, and it comes after he revamped his approach at the plate this winter.
snippet: Mike Baxter’s opening day debut with the Mets will be his first with a major league team in his eight-year career, and it comes after he revamped his approach at the plate this winter.
